He was the second man to break 2:10 in the marathon; he set world records at four other distances, but never won the marathon world record.A Brief Chat with Ron Hill , 28 September 2008. Retrieved 31 July 2009. He ran two Olympic Marathons (Tokyo 1964 and Munich 1972). In 1970, Hill won the 74th Boston Marathon.
